channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Mortgage Calculators WP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Mortgage Calculators WP

item.title: CVE-2021-24904|2024-08-03T19:49:13.405Z -- unknown -- mortgage%20calculators%20wp
item.description: The Mortgage Calculators WP WordPress plugin before 1.56 does not implement any sanitisation on the color setting of the background of a calculator, which could allow high privilege users to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
